title: Kyonyuu Onna Shikan Sennou Saimin

alternative_titles.ja: 巨乳女士官・洗脳催眠

synopsis: The battleship Chevalier sailed through space under the command of the experienced Captain Maria. The management sent an order to cut down inefficient crew members, and the stern woman carried it out. At the same time, her assistants began to complain of strange memory lapses. Then the large-sized Madame Empire began to investigate. The determined and heavy pounding of her heels echoed through the compartments. She entered Aaron's technician's quarters, and there.....
